detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value: In VISA 110-227, there are 24 seats reserved for students in the Bachelor of Media Studies (BMS) program, 39 seats for students in the Coordinated Arts Program (CAP), and 17 general seats for students in all other programs. You must also register in one of the secondary sections (labs) L21, L22, L23, or L24.

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value: This section corresponds to the primary lecture VISA 110 227.

instances.text: VISA_V 180-002 - Foundation Studio: Approaches to Media

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value: VISA 180 002 lecture is delivered online. The studio (tutorial) sections are delivered in person. You must sign up for both the lecture and one of the studio sections. There is no waitlist for VISA 180. Please check regularly for seats, particularly at the start of term as students are rearranging their schedules.

instances.text: WRDS_V 150-A_301 - Writing and Research in the Disciplines (A)

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value:
WRDS 150A is ONLY for students in the Faculty of Arts. 
Visit https://jwam.ubc.ca/undergraduate/writing-studies-programs/arts-students/wrds-150a-topics-term-2/ for WRDS 150A course topics.

If this section is closed (full) please fill out the form here: https://jwam.ubc.ca/wrds-150a-waitlist-winter-terms-1-2/ to add yourself to a wait list.

Students in other Faculties: Use the 'Search' field for WRDS 150-B.

instances.text: WRDS_V 150-A_327 - Writing and Research in the Disciplines (A)

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value:
WRDS 150A is for students in the Faculty of Arts. Some seats in this section are reserved for BIE students

For WRDS 150A course topics go to this JWAM web page: 
WRDS 150A Topics - Term 2 - School of Journalism, Writing, and Media (ubc.ca)
If this section is closed (full) you can register for a waiting list at this web address:
https://jwam.ubc.ca/wrds-150a-waitlist-winter-terms-1-2/
Students in other Faculties - Please scroll down or enter WRDS 150-B in the search bar to register in WRDS 150B sections.

uiLabels.WDRES.FACETEDSEARCH.SymanSyntax:
Boolean logic can be expressed using AND, OR, NOT, and (). 
Exact phrases can be surrounded by double quotation marks. 
Example: ("software engineer" OR computer science) AND ~manager~.
